name: Crossroad of Worlds: Star Riddle Collector's Edition
name_original: Crossroad of Worlds: Star Riddle Collector's Edition
description:
This game consists of the best mini-games and item search scenes by DominiGames! This time we continue the detective's journey of investigating a series of star thefts from across the universes. We start with an interrogation of a man who we arrested previously. He won't budge, though, refusing to tell us who he works for. We have to make a truth serum to reveal the name of his employer: a mysterious King Jotar. We set out in search of him through many worlds, and it's no easy task: the clues to his current location are scarce and he is a powerful magician, too. Many lives are at stake. Perhaps even yours. Will you put an end to his devious scheme? Reach for the stars, gather your wits and intelligence for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

🔍 Solve the case!
Ever wondered how the characters are doing since your shared adventures? Finish the main game to access a bonus chapter and help Caitlin, as she always does in every investigation you pursue, to find her lost lover!

🔍 Earn stars!
Solve mini-games and brain teasers to earn stars! At each stage of the game you need to earn stars to advance to the next level, an abundance of exciting puzzles will not leave anyone indifferent!

🔍 Enjoy the quest!
Explore a wonderful variety of locations to find all hidden items in order to advance in the investigation! Show off your detective skills and logic, save worlds and become a true hero!
